author: sduff
title: Christie Brinkley, 63, reveals incredible ageless figure in racy cut-out swimsuit as she models with daughters Sailor and Alexa – 28 years after first Sports Illustrated shoot
text:
TV Magazine Timeless beauty Christie Brinkley, 63, reveals incredible ageless figure in racy cut-out swimsuit as she models with daughters Sailor and Alexa – 28 years after first Sports Illustrated shoot 
The all American model revealed she was convinced to pose again by daughters Alexa, 31, and Sailor, 18 Pictured
